storyscript.dialogue: This is, a story about a small, small, sushi house.
storyscript.speaker: Narrator

storyscript.dialogue:
You see, I've never been to this place. Every part of the
story comes from another person, who heard it from ano-
ther guy.
storyscript.speaker: Narrator

storyscript.dialogue:
The master, Tadokoro Monosugee, left a legend story of 
him managing to pay his $1919810 debt in 3 days.

All by himself.
storyscript.speaker: Narrator

storyscript.dialogue: How does he do that? You are about to find out.
storyscript.speaker: Narrator

storyscript.dialogue:
You look fairly confused. 
How about some energizer?
storyscript.speaker: Master
